_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four things that are fulfilled by on: Immersion due to mindfulness of breathing
The steps to develop and cultivate the s: Develop the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity
Rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation
